import React from 'react' import products from '../products'; const Singleproduct = (props) => { const product = products.find((x) => x._id === props.match.params.id); if (!product) { return
Product Not Found
; } return (

  • {product.name}

  • Pirce : ${product.price}
  • Description:

    {product.description}

  • Price
    ${product.price}
  • Status
    {product.countInStock > 0 ? ( In Stock ) : ( Unavailable )}
) } export default Singleproduct
